  3. Prevent code snippets executed in the console from interacting with one-another (e.g., having something created in one console execution being used for a different console execution). ï¼ˆé é˜²é‡è¤‡åŸ·è¡ŒåŒä¸€ç‰‡æ®µï¼Ÿï¼‰

Declarations å®£å‘Š

Data structures and types è³‡æ–™æ¶æ§‹åŠå‹åˆ¥
